summary: Dariya the maid getting a boy to touch her large breast is just one incident that occurs when Yohan and Victor infiltrate two families, forcing young Liza and blind Ekaterina to appear in porn, but they are not so innocent themselves.
cast: Sergey Makovetskiy|Dinara Drukarova|Anzhelika Nevolina|Viktor Sukhorukov|Alyosha Dyo|Chingiz Tsydendambayev|Vadim Prokhorov|Aleksandr Mezentsev|Igor Shibanov|Darya Yurgens|Tatyana Polonskaya|Olga Straumit|Richard Bogutskii|Valeri Krishtapenko|Evgeniy Erokhin|Yuriy Galtsev|Boris Smolkin|Mikhail Tryasorukov|Valeriy Filonov|Anvar Libabov|Aleksandr Shutov|Aleksei Zlobin|Irina Rakshina|Valentina Viushina|Tatyana Karetina|Klim Bakhilov|Yuliya Pestretsova|Kristina Skvarek|Valeriya Yakovleva|Elena Rumyantseva|Natalya Duplyakova|Lyudmila Arzhannikova|Yelena Khrustalyova|Ilya Shakunov
title: Pro urodov i lyudey
